member.name: M:Viki.LoadRunner.Tools.Analytics.Histogram`1.Add(Viki.LoadRunner.Tools.Analytics.IDimension{`0})
member.summary: Register dimension (aka X value) Each registered dimension will become part of composite key for aggregation. Think of each dimension as part of GROUP BY key.

member.name: M:Viki.LoadRunner.Tools.Analytics.Histogram`1.Add(Viki.LoadRunner.Tools.Analytics.IMetric{`0})
member.summary: Register metric (aka Y value) Rows grouped by provided dimensions will be aggregated with registered metrics.

member.name: M:Viki.LoadRunner.Tools.Analytics.Histogram`1.Alias(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Rename result columns to desired names

member.name: M:Viki.LoadRunner.Tools.Analytics.Histogram`1.BuildResults
member.summary: Builds results into object having collumn names array and 2d array data grid

member.name: M:Viki.LoadRunner.Tools.Analytics.Histogram`1.BuildResultsObjects
member.summary: Builds dynamic results objects list, where each object has property name equal to column name. Result serialized to JSON it would produce output, which compatible with online JSON -> CSV converters.

member.name: M:Viki.LoadRunner.Tools.Analytics.IDimension`1.GetKey(`0)
member.summary: Build dimension key by current provided TestContextResult

member.name: M:Viki.LoadRunner.Tools.Analytics.IMetric`1.CreateNew
member.summary: Create new blank IMetric instance based on current instance settings (e.g. settings passed in the constructor in histogram setup)

member.name: P:Viki.LoadRunner.Tools.Analytics.IMetric`1.ColumnNames
member.summary: Names of columns produced by this metric (order must match [Values] order)

member.name: P:Viki.LoadRunner.Tools.Analytics.IMetric`1.Values
member.summary: Values produced by this metric (order must match [ColumnNames] order)
